title: Door Sfx Pack
description: a package of 141 door opening sounds that are great for games and movies, recorded on a quality microphone
longDescription:
SFX PlayList: SoundCloud

-------

What's in the package:

80 sounds of wooden doors

31 sounds of metal doors

30 sounds of a window doors

------------------------------------------------------------

a package of 141 door opening sounds that are great for games and movies, recorded on a quality microphone 

------------------------------------------------------------

Hello, my name is Pavel also called Graninbeatz, I am a music composer and sound designer, I have worked in various game development companies, I am open for cooperation - Graninbeatz@gmail.com  

questions, news, suggestions what to add and more other is in discord group

technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  High quality
